Response 1.Gary: Hey Yu Min, I heard you're planning a skydiving trip! That's so exciting!
Response 1.Yu Min: Yes, I've always wanted to try skydiving. It's going to be such a thrilling experience.

Response 2.Gary: I bet it will be! Have you decided where you're going to go for the skydiving?
Response 2.Yu Min: I'm thinking of going to Switzerland. The views there are supposed to be amazing.

Response 3.Gary: Switzerland sounds like a perfect choice for skydiving. Are you planning to do anything else while you're there?
Response 3.Yu Min: Actually, I'm thinking of extending my trip and doing a Europe tour. There are so many places I want to visit.

Response 4.Gary: That sounds like an incredible adventure! Any specific countries in Europe that you're really looking forward to?
Response 4.Yu Min: I'm really excited to visit Italy. The history, culture, and of course, the food, are all so appealing to me.

Response 5.Gary: Italy is definitely a must-visit! Do you have any other activities planned for your Europe tour?
Response 5.Yu Min: I'm hoping to do some hiking in the Swiss Alps and maybe even visit the Eiffel Tower in Paris.

Response 6.Gary: Hiking in the Swiss Alps sounds like a dream come true. Have you started planning out your itinerary yet?
Response 6.Yu Min: Not yet, but I'm looking forward to researching and putting together a detailed plan for the trip.

Response 7.Gary: It's always fun to plan out all the details and anticipate the adventures that await. When are you thinking of going on this trip?
Response 7.Yu Min: I'm aiming for next summer. I want to make sure I have enough time to save up and plan everything out perfectly.

Response 8.Gary: That sounds like a good plan. I'm sure the anticipation will only make the trip even more exciting. Have you told anyone else about your skydiving and Europe tour plans?
Response 8.Yu Min: Yes, I've shared it with a few close friends and they're all really supportive and excited for me.

Response 9.Gary: It's great to have friends who are supportive of your adventures. I can't wait to hear all about your skydiving experience and Europe tour when you get back!
Response 9.Yu Min: I'll definitely have lots of stories and photos to share. It's going to be an unforgettable experience for sure.
